title: Beware: Your Uber Ride May Come With A Side Of Oversharing
teaser: The "sharing economy" has created a lot of solutions for cheap rides and places to stay. In a piece for Ozy.com, Pooja Bhatia writes about one undesired byproduct: oversharing.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
